titleStmt.title: The Solemn mock procession of the Pope, cardinalls, Jesuits, fryers &c. through the city of London, November the 17th, 1680

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nathaniel Ponder ..., Jonathan Wilkins ..., and Samuel Lee ...,

notesStmt.note: "There will be no other true representation of this procession but this."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
